document_data.name: ''Stormsailer''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Stormsailer''''' was a [[Halruaan skyship]] which had been secured for the use of the [[Datharathi]] [[chaka]] under Captain [[Darsson]] in {{yearlink|1374}}. That year, [[Sevaera Datharathi]] and [[Warian Datharathi]] used the ship to reach [[Adama's Tooth]], in order to visit [[Shaddon Datharathi]]. Unknown to Sevaera, [[Zeltaebar Datharathi]] had snuck onboard before their trip.{{cite book/Darkvision|145-148|15}}
